Class Thrower

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team4564.robot.Thrower

  • public class Thrower
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the functions and state of the thrower subsystem.
    Author:
    Brewer FIRST Robotics Team 4564, Evan McCoy, Jacob Cote

               double i,

        i - the integral scaler.
